page.title: 06EAST LINTON LAURA'S HOME
page.content: My house is in Kingsburgh Gardens and is about three years old. It is a detached bungalow. I like my house. I have my own bedroom. My mum,dad, Karen and I live in the house. It is built with bricks and has a study, three bedrooms,kitchen,dining room,living room,bathroom,shower room and utility room. Our garden is quite big. There is a shed in my back garden. My sister and I made it into a kind of house. We have a garage where my mum keeps her car and we keep our bikes. My dad keeps his car in the drive. My bedroom is quite small. In it I have a bed, chest of drawers, bookcase,desk,chair and fitted wardrobe.
